item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans!!

Learn to Salsa in 2 days!!!!!!

The Masacote School is hosting a weekend of parties and styling workshops July 9-11. Even if you can't make the workshops, join us at the EVENING PARTIES for some great dancing! Parties are only $15 in advance or $20 at the door.

*** ALSO!!! We have arranged a Private Beginner Class for Meetup members from 9pm to 10pm on both July 9 and July 10. It will be a 2 day beginner class for the group alone, and the cost will be ONLY $5 EXTRA EACH DAY! THIS includes 1 hour of private Meetup Group lessons before the start of the party.

We need at least 10 meet-up members to make this work!

Price:

LESSONS AND PARTY: $20 in advance (add 0.91 as Paypal fee)
**Must RSVP in advance for the lessons**
To register for the lesson and party, register through the meetup site today!!!


PARTY ONLY: $15 in advance ($20 at door)
To register for the party only, sign up at:
http://www.projectsty...

Location:

Courtyard Marriott
Street: 275 Tremont St
City/Town: Boston, MA 02116

Time:

Lessons: 9pm to 10pm (Lets Meet at 8:45 or so)
Party: 10pm

"We're trying to watch our gender ratio, so please help keep the balance.""

Email me if you have any questions.

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my fedora hat. Pretty easy to find !!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Salsa at Courtyard Marriott DOWNTOWN; Private Beginner Class for MEETUP!
